message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study builds on data from the World Bank Enterprise Surveys in Sub-Saharan Africa to analyze the factors affecting access to finance for small and medium enterprises.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Regional Integration"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the International Comparison Program database, we estimate that the gap between PPP and market exchange rate measures of GDP per capita in low-income countries was about 26 percent in 2020.", "dataset": ["International Comparison Program database"], "topic": ["Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "We utilize a comprehensive dataset of land conflict incidents and public expenditures from the Community-Driven Development program in the Philippines to examine the impact of infrastructure projects on conflict resolution.", "dataset": ["land conflict incidents", "public expenditures from Community-Driven Development program"], "topic": ["Infrastructure", "Fragility, Conflict, and Violence"]}, {"sentence": "This analysis combines household survey data from Mexico's ENIGH with data from the country's Public Service Company to examine how electricity subsidies affect household welfare.", "dataset": ["Mexico's ENIGH", "Public Service Company"], "topic": ["Energy", "Social Protection"]}, {"sentence": "We leverage data from the Demographic and Health Surveys and Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys to explore the relationship between maternal education and child health outcomes in selected countries in Southeast Asia.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Surveys", "Multiple Indicator Cluster Surveys"], "topic": ["Health", "Education", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "Using a novel panel dataset on mobile money agents in Uganda, we identify the determinants of agent activity levels and evaluate the effectiveness of policy interventions aimed at increasing adoption of digital financial services.", "dataset": ["panel dataset on mobile money agents in Uganda"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Digital Development"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze a unique dataset on global fishing activity using satellite-based ship tracking data to assess the effectiveness of different fishery management policies in promoting sustainability of fish stock.", "dataset": ["satellite-based ship tracking data"], "topic": ["Environment"]}, {"sentence": "Combining household survey data from Tanzania with administrative tax records, we examine the extent and determinants of income underreporting among smallholder farmers.", "dataset": ["household survey data from Tanzania", "administrative tax records"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "Using a rich dataset on financial flows across borders, we investigate how capital account liberalization affects the incidence and severity of financial crises in emerging market economies.", "dataset": ["rich dataset on financial flows across borders"], "topic": ["Macroeconomics", "Debt"]}, {"sentence": "This paper utilizes datasets from the World Bank's Global Financial Inclusion Database and its Enterprise Surveys to compare access to finance among formal and informal enterprises in African countries, investigating the drivers of this gap.", "dataset": ["Global Financial Inclusion Database", "Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Competitiveness", "Regional Integration"]}]
